Stop-loss strategy: [20% decline from current price or ROE < 15%]
Sell when the stock price falls by 15% from the current price or when the ROE and ROA indicators show a significant decline.
Sell when the stock price falls by 15% or when the ROE and ROA decline consecutively for two years.
Trigger a sell order if the stock price falls by 15% from the current price, or if the ROE and ROA indicators show a significant decline.
